import React from "react"; const Terms = () => { return (

Terms & Conditions

Effective Date: April 2025

1. Introduction

Welcome to the Car Rescue Recovery Service, provided by Robert Motoring Consult. By booking our services, you agree to comply with these Terms & Conditions.

2. Booking & Payments

  • A non-refundable booking fee of KES 1,500 must be paid via Paystack before service confirmation.
  • Once payment is received, the rescue service will be dispatched to the provided location.

3. Cancellation & Refund Policy

  • The booking fee is non-refundable unless the service is unavailable.
  • If the rescue vehicle cannot reach the customer due to incorrect location details, no refund will be issued.

4. Service Limitations

Our services include standard car towing, breakdown assistance, and accident recovery. Repairs, fuel refills, or other mechanical services are not provided.

5. Liability & Damages

We ensure careful handling of all vehicles but are not liable for pre-existing vehicle damage.

6. User Responsibilities

Customers must provide accurate vehicle details and location for efficient service.

7. Privacy & Data Protection

We only collect necessary details for service delivery. Your information will not be shared with third parties except for service-related purposes.

8. Amendments to Terms

We reserve the right to update these Terms & Conditions without prior notice.

9. Contact Us

For inquiries, contact us at info@robertmotoringconsult.com or via WhatsApp at +254708557555.

); }; export default Terms;
